text: |Term|Abbreviation|Explanation| |||| |Creative Enterprise Zone|CEZ|A Mayor of London initiative to establish clusters of creative production, which provide affordable premises and enterprise-related incentives for artists and creative businesses, pro-culture planning and housing policies and offer career pathways and creative jobs for local communities and young people. Tower Hamlets contains one CEZ: The Hackney Wick and Fish Island CEZ in the east of the borough.| |Data Centre||A data centre is a physical facility composed of networked computers and storage that businesses and other organisations use to organise, process, store and disseminate large amounts of data.| |Design code||A set of simple, concise, illustrated design requirements that are visual and numerical wherever possible to provide specific, detailed parameters for the physical development of a site or area.|
